sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 8.0001 Definitions.—In accordance with s. 8(a), Art. X of the State Constitution, the United States Decennial Census of 2020 is the official census of the state for the purposes of congressional redistricting.

sections.heading: Division of state into congressional districts.
Inclusion of unlisted territory in contiguous districts.
sections.text: of unlisted territory in contiguous districts.

sections.heading: Members of governmental agencies appointed pursuant to former district boundaries unaffected by new district boundaries.
sections.text: of governmental agencies appointed pursuant to former district boundaries unaffected by new district boundaries.

sections.heading: Electronic maps to serve as the official maps of congressional districts; availability.
sections.text: maps to serve as the official maps of congressional districts; availability.

sections.heading: Limitation on choice of venue for actions challenging congressional districts.
sections.text: on choice of venue for actions challenging congressional districts.

sections.heading: Limitations on actions challenging congressional districts.
Applicability
sections.text: 8.07 Applicability.—The congressional districts prescribed in s. 8.0002 apply with respect to the qualification, nomination, and election to the office of representative to the Congress of the United States in the primary and general elections held in 2022 and thereafter.
